data.message: i really dont like the scalability in facebook , its look like a mess with alot of  different techs and programming language  i like twitter and of course amazon aws and google scalability ( in house architecture and app engine )
I have no idea about the stuff you mentioned (twitter, amazon aws...etc) but remember that FB is the single social network application which makes it different in nature than the others.
